dict.acceptation: 会议；讨论；（正式）讨论会；[工会、工党用语]（每年的）大会；

sent.orig: Taking part in company production dispatch conference and safety condition analysis conference timely.
sent.trans: 参加公司定期召开的生产调度会和安全情况分析会，汇报公用工程安全生产情况。

sent.orig: In Copenhagen, Denmark United Nation climate change conference open Nations Climate Change Conference opened this week.
sent.trans: 本周，联合国气候变化会议在丹麦首都哥本哈根召开。

sent.orig: This conference will be an expanded version of IMAPS' long-running and successful annual Ceramic Interconnect Conference.
sent.trans: 此次会议将是国际微电子协会一个长期而且成功的陶瓷交流会议的扩充。

sent.orig: A very warm welcome to our Sales Conference 2008, the 3rd Sales Conference in Asia Pacific!
sent.trans: 首先，热烈欢迎各位出席本公司2008年度销售会议，也是亚太区的第3届销售会议。

sent.orig: Frequently the publications are a collection of conference papers presented at an ASTM sponsored conference.
sent.trans: 通常情况下，该出版物包含ASTM赞助会议的会议文献资料。
